Message:
The children threw
a small party for me.

and a bouquet made of
wildflowers—I was floored.

When were they able to
pull this off...?

“We’ll work extra hard
now that Belle’s gone,
so feel better please!”

the children said as
they gifted me a picture.

“You all did this to
cheer me up, didn’t you?”

I wrapped my arms
around the children,
doing my best to hold
back the tears.

These children are my
reasons for living...

I hoped, with every
fiber of my being...
